metadata.title: CVE-2018-5380 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The Quagga BGP daemon (bgpd) prior to version 1.2.3 can overrun internalBGP code-to-string conversion tables used for debug by 1 pointer value,based on input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quagga package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.5').
